summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of West Bertona Street, from Arapahoe Place to the east margin of 39th Avenue West together with the right to make the necessary slopes for cuts and fills upon the abutting property in the reasonable original grading of said street, providing for the acquisition, appropriation, taking, and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor by purchase and/or condemnation and providing for the payment therefor.
